item.title: KILLER INN second closed beta test set for October 3 to 13
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Preview playable at Tokyo Game Show 2025.

Publisher and developer Square Enix, and developer Tactic Studios will host the second closed beta test for multiplayer murder mystery action game KILLER INN from October 3 at 3:00 p.m. PT / 6:00 p.m. ET to October 13 at 2:59 p.m. PT / 5:59 p.m. ET, the companies announced.

Players who participated in the first closed beta test can automatically join the second closed beta test. New players can register via the Steam page, and will be notified of their ability to participate on October 1.

The second closed beta test will include several updates, including a reassessment of certain game design elements, balance adjustments, and the addition of new features based on player feedback.

Users attending Tokyo Game Show 2025, which runs from September 25 to 28 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan, will be able to play an early preview of the second closed beta test at the Square Enix booth. Those who play the game at the booth will also receive an invitation code to join the public test when it launches.

KILLER INN will be available for PC via Steam. A release date has yet to be announced.
